caption: This wood fire pizza place was absolutely delicious. The 🍕was on point. And the eggplant  and burratta dips with the breads were great 👍
Friendly staff and good food
The pizza was outstanding and the service was exceptional...A cut above!
The ONLY place locally my whole family can eat and enjoy together. <3

This wasn’t my first time at Flatbread Social but this experience in particular was equally as memorable as the first. Our server Jerod was a rockstar. He was very attentive even and came by with an introduction. He followed back around …
Ordered from Flatbread social for our wedding rehearsal. The food was delicious and they were very easy to work with you!

Specializing in wood fired pizza and fresh salads. Casual dining in a spacious uncrowded unrushed atmosphere - indoor tables were well spaced and storefront was open to the outside. Our party of five enjoyed dinner celebrating a family …
cocktails and food both 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥
Great upscale pizza restaurant specializing in thin crust aka flatbread. The trendy decor enhances the atmosphere and is something beautiful in the summer time/night.
Great pizza.. nice beer selection and make your own cocktail...service was attentive.  Definitely will go again
Excellent food and social distance very good flatbread pizzas
Food was excellent pizza was hot service was fast. And I didn't have to touch a menu. Great place

Terrible experience, service was horrific. Served the wrong drink, and the charged a second time for the correct beverage. Food was less than par for what you're paying for... I will not be back, nor recommend.
New school old school pizza joint. Amazing pies, and wings. Beer prices are a touch higher than average for Saratoga, but it doesn't stop me.

Love the ambiance of the place. It's one part new and one part old school. They have a great mix of music playing as well as a top notch bar. There are 2 mini shuffleboard tables. Staff were busy but really awesome nice people. Very family …
Delicious woodfire pizza  ... and they have shuffleboard!
Good food and service. Great to see the scuffle board games, brings back childhood memories.

Phenomenal staff!  I am so impressed with our friendly, knowledgeable & attentive server Jerry!  As per his recommendation, the Squash Salad & Garlic Parmesan Wings were delicious.  Great Old Fashion cocktail from the bar too!
Awesome pizza and beer

We shared the Sunday Salad and “The only kind of pizza there is” this past weekend.  The space has a cool mural behind the bar and some great artwork framed by the booths. The bar is deep and shuffleboard is on option (very cool), but …
Food was awesome. All I remember is how great the food was...

Nice environment and good selections for a pizza joint. The pizza is a classic wood fired pizza, though the prizes are semi high, I was able to share the pizza with my partner and have some left overs. The drink menu is a wide variety of …
New favorite
Amazing new pizza place in Saratoga county. Good  ambience. Wood fired styled pizzas. Indoor plants and decor is done by the owner very well. Street parking could be tricky, plan accordingly.
Love this place food is excellent  servers  are very nice will be back again
Amazing food & atmosphere
Average pizza with a random beach/California theme.
we came in on a whim and were pleasantly surprised!  What a fun place and staff. Our server Alicia was so helpful and nice. The food is so yummy and good beer selection! Definitely coming back!
Delicious and great service
The food was very good, prices were not.  6 wings for $10 is just not right - even if you are in Saratoga.  Maybe your paying for the "free shuffleboard"
Delicious pizza...shuffleboard...cold beer!
Good product and service but a bit too noisy.
Good beer selection. Pass on the pizza
Great drink specials for millennials.
Yummmm...tried 2 types of flatbreads and they were both amazing! Fast service and good live music.
LOVE IT!
Ok place, kind of expensive and very loud
Super tasty spot for a different take on pizza.
A little over-priced for what you get and the red sauce isn't the greatest. I like the location and openness of the restaurant
The beet salad rocked my world
Service was great. Food wasn't.
I walked out after looking at the menu and seeing the food. Hype place. U are paying for small amount of cheese and sauce on a generic flatbread
closest to the pizza  you would have in Italy although it is pricey!
Pizza was great, drink menu was alright.
Meh....
Fun atmosphere and interesting pizzas
Good
Great service from Mindy at the bar.
Awesome pizza and a great place to go to with family and kids!
Great food and drinks
So good!!!
Nice place good flatbreads and toppings. Ovens are not up to full heat till later in the afternoon. But pizzas are still great!
Great food, great atmosphere, great staff, great owners- what more could you want?
Great pizza bar music. Wonderful addition to SS
A cool open environment, good service, excellent music and a solid, simple menu. The meatballs, bread and sauce were my favorite part.

Nice atmosphere, they had 2 long "puck" sliding boards to keep you entertained while you waited. We had a veggie pizza which could have been cooked longer but the taste was good. We also had an appetizer which was very good. The draft beer …
Great food, great atmosphere! Would definitely recommend!
Great pizza, the place looks great with the new renovation. Prices for pizza are steep for their size. Would go again though, its quite family friendly and had a young crowd too which was nice.
Killer place. Very authentic sauces and recipes. Quality farm ingredients. Really surprised.

Look...the pizza is good. The interior is cool looking. The problem lies with the pricing. $18 to $19 for a personal size pizza!  Too much especially with all of the good (fairly priced) pizza places around.  Just can't justify this pricing.
Great pizza. Their breakfast pizza is a must-have.
Their pizza is soooo good.

Went on a Thursday night around 6:30. Lots of families. As the night went on the crowd changed. Casual, fun, beachy environment. Loud but not in a bad way. The pizza oven is no joke. Nice thin crust. Had the Green Goddess and Prosciutto in Love which comes with an egg on top. Delicious!
Best Pizza in town. It's about time we get something other than "fast food" pizza

Went on a Tuesday evening, rather looking forward to it knowing of course, the success of Henry's taproom next door which is owned by the same couple as Flatbread.  Sat at the bar. Well lit but just the right amount of ambience to make it …

Stumbled upon it on opening day, New Year's Eve, with my husband and kids and were pleasantly surprised. Food was amazing, service was friendly and we were able to have an adult conversation while our kids enjoyed the shuffleboard tables. Great lunch or dinner spot!
We are so lucky to finally get a flatbread place in town and very delicious!!!  So kid friendly.  Major score for Saratogians and tourists!!

Tried Flat Bread Social last night and I’m just going to say, it may be my new favorite spot in town for artisan pizza. Crispy crust with fresh ingredients makes for the perfect combo. Delectable food along with an inviting atmosphere, you must try it! We will definitely be back.
